title: अयोध्या फैसले के मद्देनज़र सोशल मीडिया की निगरानी का फर्ज़ी संदेश वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Ayodhya District Magistrate, Anuj Kumar Jha prohibits social media messages & posters on Ayodhya land case, that could disturb communal harmony, in view of upcoming festivals & verdict in Ayodhya land case. Prohibition will stay in force till 28th December, 2019.
